---
title: "Search the Gospel Buddy"
output:
  html_document:
    includes:
      in_header: "https://www.mygospelbuddy.com/docs/header.html"
      after_body: "https://www.mygospelbuddy.com/docs/footer.html"
---

<head>
<style>
  body {
    text-align: center;
  }
  #plotContainer {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
    max-height: 80vh; /* Limits the height to 80% of the viewport height */
    margin: auto;
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures no overflow */
  }
  canvas {
    width: 100% !important;
    height: auto !important;
    max-height: 100%;
  }
  
  .dropdown {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  
  .dropbtn {
      background-color: #00000; /* Gray background */
      color: black; /* Black text */
      padding: 5px 8px; /* Less padding */
      font-size: 12px;
      border: 1px solid black; /* Black border */
      cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .dropbtn::after {
      content: '\25BC'; /* Black down-pointing triangle */
      font-size: 12px;
      color: black;
  }
  
  .dropdown-content {
      display: none;
      position: absolute;
      background-color: #f9f9f9;
      min-width: 160px;
      box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
      z-index: 1;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
  
  .dropdown-content label {
      color: black;
      padding: 12px 16px;
      text-decoration: none;
      display: block;
  }
  
  .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
      display: block;
  }

</style>

</head>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/PapaParse/5.3.0/papaparse.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://www.mygospelbuddy.com/search/words-search.js"></script>

<input type="text" id="wordInput" placeholder="Enter a word to search..." style="width: 60%; padding: 10px; margin-top: 20px;">
<button onclick="clearSearch()">Clear</button>
<button onclick="searchAndDisplay()">Search</button>


<div class="dropdown">
  <button id="dropdownButton" class="dropbtn"></button>
  <div id="dropdownContent" class="dropdown-content">
  <label>by conference <input type="checkbox" id="conferenceToggle"></label>
  </div>
</div>

<div id="plotContainer">
  <canvas id="plotCanvas"></canvas>
</div>

<div id="tableContainer">
</div>
